column4: I am installing Ubuntu 10.04 LTS - In the installer, it shows there being 7 steps
However, it jumps from Step 5 (Account details) to Step 7 (Ready to Install)
there is an "alternate installer" that works well if the normal installer has issues.
it installs fine, its just i'm documenting each step for our auditors, and wondering where the hell step 6 is :)
